name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
description: A crispy golden way to prepare your favorite bird!  This recipe calls for two cups of all purpose flour.

name: Pork Belly
description: Fatty, rich, and succulent, braised to perfection.  You will need two pounds of fresh pork belly.

name: Hainan Chicken Rice
description: Delicious poached chicken served over rice.  The most important ingredient is the chicken.

name: Noodles with Meat Sauce
description: Noodles with a beefy sauce and cold cut vegetables.  Start by bringing a pot of water to a boil.

name: Grilled Steak
description: Sizzling its way to your heart, this recipe makes the perfect steak.  Start by picking up a high-quality cut of beef.

name: Strawberry Waffle
description: An amazing waffle topped with fresh ripe strawberries is a delightful summer treat.  You'll need two cups of flour to make the batter.

name: Sushi Platter
description: No need to go to the sushi bar when you have this recipe!  Sashimi grade fish can be found in many Asian supermarkets.

name: Raspberry Delight
description: A half sphere of pure fruity goodness.  Indulge your sweet tooth with this amazing recipe.
